snippet.title: SCP: Infohazard - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
FOLLOW THE KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gibgames/scp-infohazard
PLAY THE DEMO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121570/SCP_Infohazard/

--
Alert. This Facility is in lockdown.

SCP: Infohazard is a survival horror game, where you take on the role of a test subject utilized by the mysterious SCP Foundation to help deal with the most dangerous monsters and anomalies that they contain. When an experiment is sabotaged and reality itself is threatened, you must navigate through the depths of Site-97 and to find a way to stop what might just be the end of the world.

SCP: Infohazard immerses you in the inner workings of The SCP Foundation like never before, with breathtaking details, clever puzzles, heart-pounding stealth, combat, and more. Use the environment to your advantage as you avoid the escaped anomalies, defend yourself again corrupted facility staff, and explore an environment twisted by the surreal.

SCP includes collaboration from voice actors, writers, and artists from all over the SCP community, bringing the Foundation to life like never before.

--
Connect with us:
Discord - https://discord.gg/gibgames
Twitter (X) -  https://twitter.com/GIBGames
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@gibgames

Credits and attribution: https://scp.game/about/
